message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $11,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality item that could be worth $12,000 to you. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the introductory price, but I'm looking to pay closer to $10,500.  This price would be a good value for me and allow us both to make a fair deal. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider a compromise. In light of this, I propose a price of $11,000 for the product. This is a bit higher than your offer but still reflects its true value. I hope this proposal works for you, and please let me know if you need further consideration.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $11,000 is still a bit high for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $10,750? I believe this price is fair for both of us, and it would allow us to finalize the deal.
